nodes.text: Jaguada was the only inhabited planet of the Jaguada system, located at the junction of Kamat Aegit and Kamat Krote, within the Stygian Caldera in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy.

It was a barren, desert world, with only one city. At one point during its history, Jaguada was under the control of the Sith Empire. Darth Gravid's fortress was constructed on the world at around 550 BBY by Darths Gravid and Gean.

During the Clone Wars, it allied itself with the Confederacy of Independent Systems. By the end of that conflict, however, the Galactic Republic had established a garrison of clone troopers on the planet.
It was orbited by a single moon.
